Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's left hand# is #a Boss Key#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the path to #Morpha#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that playing #Sun's Song# in a grave spawns #a Piece of Heart#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path to #Twinrova#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path to #Twinrova#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Bolero of Fire#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that in #Gerudo Valley# the hammer unlocks #a Red Rupee#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Recovery Heart#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Song of Storms#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Huge Rupee#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Skull Kid# grants #the Megaton Hammer#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Deku Shield#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a chest in the #central pillar of Water Temple# contains #a Small Key#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that beyond the #river in the Water Temple# waits #a Boss Key#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the path to #Phantom Ganon#.
